content.original: Large caliber cluster rounds capable of dealing heavy damage, and designed to be used in an LB 10-X.
content.prevOriginal: Large caliber cluster rounds capable of dealing heavy damage, and designed to be used in an LB 10-X.
content.content: 大口径群组子弹,能够造成大量伤害,被设计用于LB10-X.

content.original: Massive cluster rounds, designed for devastating impact, to be used in an LB 20-X.
content.prevOriginal: Massive cluster rounds, designed for devastating impact, to be used in an LB 20-X.
content.content: 为LBX/20重型群组弹药,具有毁灭性的冲击力.

content.original: Small caliber cluster ammunition designed for long range fire in an LB 2-X.
content.prevOriginal: Small caliber cluster ammunition designed for long range fire in an LB 2-X.
content.content: 被设计用于LB2-X远程射击的小口径群组弹药.

content.original: Moderate caliber cluster rounds, suitable for long range fire in an LB 5-X.
content.prevOriginal: Moderate caliber cluster rounds, suitable for long range fire in an LB 5-X.
content.content: 中等口径群组弹药,适合LB 5-X远程射击.

content.original: Short range missiles that deploy a targeting beacon that increases damage from subsequent missile attacks.
content.prevOriginal: Short range missiles that deploy a targeting beacon that increases damage from subsequent missile attacks.
content.content: 短程导弹,能够部署瞄准信标,增加后续导弹攻击的伤害.

content.original: Inferno SRM Ammo. SHOULD NOT BE PURCHASABLE OR AVAILABLE!!! Inferno Racks should have internal ammo only.
content.prevOriginal: Inferno SRM Ammo. SHOULD NOT BE PURCHASABLE OR AVAILABLE!!! Inferno Racks should have internal ammo only.
content.content: SRM炼狱弹药.不应购买或提供!!!炼狱火箭应该只有内部弹药.

content.original:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

LB 10-X Ammo Bins each contain 8 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
content.prevOriginal:
Ammo Bins contain the rounds needed for projectile-based weaponry, with at least one bin required per weapon type. Upon receiving a Critical Hit, any remaining ammunition stored inside an Ammo Bin will explode dealing damage to the install location. Risk can be mitigated with the use of C.A.S.E.

LB 10-X Ammo Bins each contain 8 rounds and may feed multiple weapons.
content.content:
弹药舱包含射弹武器所需的弹药,每种武器类型至少需要一个弹舱.在受到致命损伤后,储存在弹舱中的任何剩余弹药将爆炸,对安装部位造成伤害.使用C.A.S.E.可以降低风险.

每个LB 10-X弹舱都包含8发弹药,可供多个武器使用.
